name: Termination (tanvir-shanto)
description:
Welcome to TERMINATION, a short and simple top down shooter made with love2D. You are a soldier who has to terminate your way through swarms of zombies and also the corporation who's behind of creating these zombies in the first place.

The assets which are not mine, I have given proper attribution for them in game. And also in the "credits.txt" file in the game.
